OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Mode.label: Mode
Mode.tooltip:
Set the mode of the game 
 
[Revlo] 1-60 Lose, 61-98 Double your bet, 99-100 triple your bet. 
 
[Revlo Advanced] Customize the values from the Revlo mode.
 
[Random] Numbers don't matter at all. Set your win chance, win multiplicator and min, max values for the roll. Throw your viewers off 
 
[Percentage] Rolls will give a payout in percentage bonus equal to the roll value. 0 roll = lost all currency, 100 = doubled currency 
 
[Single Number] You decide exactly what numbers are the winning ones. High low or a mix in between

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

AllWord.label: Word to go all in
AllWord.tooltip: Keyword to used after the command to allow the user to bet all their points

ForceAll.label: Force all in
ForceAll.tooltip: If this is enabled the user will automatically bet ALL their points

UseRandom.label: Use random bets
UseRandom.tooltip: If this is enabled the bet amount will be randomized, the user will not be able to pick their own bet size

RandomMin.label: Min % for random bet
RandomMin.tooltip: Min amount in percentage of users total points that will be used to randomize a number

RandomMax.label: Max % for random bet
RandomMax.tooltip: Max amount in percentage of users total points that will be used to randomize a number

JackpotEnabled.label: Jackpot mode
JackpotEnabled.tooltip: If this is enabled all losing gambles will add to the jackpot value

JackpotNumber.label: Jackpot number
JackpotNumber.tooltip: Number that if rolled will give the jackpot!

JackpotPercentage.label: Jackpot accumulation value (%)
JackpotPercentage.tooltip: % of the losing bets that will be added to the jackpot

JackpotBase.label: Jackpot base value
JackpotBase.tooltip: Base value for the jackpot. This value is what the jackpot starts at and will reset to when someone wins the jackpot

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

NotEnoughResponse.value: {0} you don't have that many {1} to gamble
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user try to gamble more than they have 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currency name 
 {2} = command name

WinResponse.label: Win response
WinResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user wins 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = value won 
 {2} = points after win 
 {3} = Currency name

LoseResponse.label: Lose response
LoseResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points! 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = value won 
 {2} = points after win 
 {3} = Currency name 
 {4} = Jackpot value

TooMuchResponse.label: Gambling too much
TooMuchResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user tries to gamble more than allowed 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = max bet amount 
 {2} = currencyname

TooLowResponse.label: Gambling too little
TooLowResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user tries to gamble less than allowed 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = min bet amount 
 {2} = currencyname

InfoResponse.label: Info response
InfoResponse.tooltip: Message sent when user doesn't manage to gamble correctly

PermissionResp.value: $user -> only $permission ($permissioninfo) and higher can use this command
PermissionResp.label: Permission denied response
PermissionResp.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

JackpotWin.value: {0} won the jackpot of {1} {3} and now has a total of {2} {3}
JackpotWin.label: Jackpot win response
JackpotWin.tooltip:
Message sent when user check jackpot size if that option is enabled 
 {0} = User 
 {1} = Jackpot won 
 {2} = points after winning the jackpot 
 {3} = Currencyname

NoZero.value: {0} -> You are not allowed to roll anything less than 1!
NoZero.label: Negative gamble amount response
NoZero.tooltip:
Message sent when user tries to roll a negative number 
{0} = User

NoCurrency.value: {0} -> You don't have any currency to gamble!
NoCurrency.label: No currency response
NoCurrency.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have any currency to gamble 
{0} = User

Jackpot.label: Current Jackpot
Jackpot.tooltip:
Current jackpot amount, 
 OBS require reload to update

JackpotCheck.label: Users can check jackpot size
JackpotCheck.tooltip: Enable/Disable the option for users to check the jackpot size

JackpotWord.label: Word to check jackpot
JackpotWord.tooltip: The word used after command to check the current jackpot size

JackpotResponse.label: Jackpot response
JackpotResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user check jackpot size if that option is enabled 
 {0} = Jackpot size 
 {1} = Currencyname

TripleWinEnabled.label: triple win
TripleWinEnabled.tooltip: Enable/Disable Chance to triple your points. (normal win is doubling your points)

TripleChance.label: triple Win Chance
TripleChance.tooltip: Chance in % to triple your bet (2 x win amount)

MinBet.label: Min bet amount
MinBet.tooltip: Min bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

MaxBet.label: Max bet amount
MaxBet.tooltip: Max bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

RMinValue.label: Min roll value
RMinValue.tooltip: Min value of the rolled number

RMaxValue.label: Max roll value
RMaxValue.tooltip: Max value of the rolled number

RMinBet.label: Min bet amount
RMinBet.tooltip: Min bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

RMaxBet.label: Max bet amount
RMaxBet.tooltip: Max bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

PMinValue.label: Min roll value
PMinValue.tooltip:
Min value of the rolled number. 
 [NOTE] This is also the lowest % of the bet a viewer can get back

PMaxValue.label: Max roll value
PMaxValue.tooltip:
Max value of the rolled number. 
 [NOTE] This is also the highest % of the bet a viewer can win

PMinBet.label: Min bet amount
PMinBet.tooltip: Min bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

PMaxBet.label: Max bet amount
PMaxBet.tooltip: Max bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

SMinValue.label: Min roll value
SMinValue.tooltip: Min value of the rolled number.

SMaxValue.label: Max roll value
SMaxValue.tooltip: Max value of the rolled number.

SMinBet.label: Min bet amount
SMinBet.tooltip: Min bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

SMaxBet.label: Max bet amount
SMaxBet.tooltip: Max bet a user can place. 0 = DISABLED

SMultiplier.label: Win multiplier
SMultiplier.tooltip: How much to multiply the the bet with in case of win!

ControlC.label: PLACEHOLDER
ControlC.tooltip: Copy the filepath for index.html directly to clipboard for easy insertion in your streaming software

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script
